title: Data Analytics Specialist
content:
Interested in being part of a team that impacts millions of people? If you're energized by our vision to make the world a better place and you empathize with our players, then read on!
We’re hiring exceptional people to help and grow our game titles— and to dream up new ideas that will reach millions. In this role, you will be working in a fast-paced world with some of the smartest minds in the industry.
What you need?


BA/MSc in Computer Science, Math, Statistics, Engineering, or other quantitative fields


Enthusiastic about data analytics and data science


SQL and Python skills to analyze data and build analytical models


Experience working with large datasets


Experience with BI tools to visualize data like Tableau, Oracle BI etc. 


Familiarity with A/B testing


Familiarity with web analytics tools like Google Analytics, Omniture--nice to have


Ability to manage multiple priorities


Being functionally productive and efficient while working across teams


Must be able to work well in an extremely fast-paced environment with high volume projects and quick turn-around


What you’ll be doing?


Work with large amounts of data to find opportunities to improve the experience that Zynga provides to its players


Get insights about user behaviors with analyzing data to improve core game metrics


Construct flexible monitoring dashboards of core game metrics


Support decision making on A/B tests and identify successes, failures, and trends


Work on advanced analytical models like LTV, Churn, Segmentation


Who we are?
We are a game studio;


In Zynga family located in Istanbul


Responsible for biggest board and card games in Turkey and USA


Believe in team spirit/collaboration


Having passionate, ambitious, and eager to learn/experience mates


 
Zynga is an equal opportunity employer. We are proud of our broad community; we do not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, medical condition, disability, or any other class or characteristic protected by applicable law. We welcome job-seekers, players, employees, and partners from all backgrounds. Join us!
We will consider all qualified job-seekers with criminal histories in a manner consistent with applicable law.
Zynga is committed to providing reasonable accommodation to applicants with disabilities. If you need accommodation during the interview process, please let us know.Zynga does not  engage in financial exchanges during the recruitment or onboarding process. We do not conduct job interviews over third-party messaging apps such as Telegram, WhatsApp or others. We will never ask you for your personal or financial information over unofficial chat channels. Our in-house recruitment team only contacts individuals via official company email addresses (i.e., via a zynga.com or naturalmotion.com email domain).
If you believe you have been the victim of a scam, you may wish to contact the authorities. In the United States, you may file a complaint with the FBI. More information is available here: https://www.ic3.gov.

demographic_questions.header: Ireland and United Kingdom Demographic Questions
demographic_questions.description:
As part of our Diversity and Inclusion Strategy we would like to collect demographic information from job candidates to identify and implement strategies to understand and improve equal opportunity for all at Zynga. Completion of this information is entirely voluntary and any details you provide will not be considered in the hiring process. Zynga will anonymize demographic information for reporting and analytics to gain a better understanding of our hiring process. This  information will only be used internally within Zynga and stored securely on our systems.  

For Zynga’s full privacy notice, click here for US Job Applicant privacy notice and here for the Outside of the US Job Applicant Privacy Notice . You can email Privacy@zynga.com for more information regarding the collections and use of your data.

questions.description: By clicking "I Acknowledge", you acknowledge that your personal information will be collected and used by Zynga based on the Privacy Notice for Job Applicants (the “Privacy Notice”), available at https://www.take2games.com/applicantprivacypolicy/. The Privacy Notice provides information about how we use your data and how you can exercise your data rights (such as access, correction, or deletion). If you need more information, please contact the Privacy Contact identified in the Privacy Notice.
